tool_description: An API showing latest climate change news around the UK
name: Climate Change Ania
title: Climate Change Ania

api_list.name: Get certain newspaper news
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-ania.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-ania.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-ania.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-ania.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://climate-change-ania.p.rapidapi.com/news"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
